attributes.action: The United Kingdom should acknowledge and recognise the ethnic cleansing of the minority Turkish Cypriot population in Cyprus from 1955-1974 by the right wing Greek Cypriot terrorist organisation Eoka B
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Kingdom should acknowledge and recognise the ethnic cleansing of the minority Turkish Cypriot population in Cyprus from 1955-1974 by the right wing Greek Cypriot terrorist organisation Eoka B and for the United Kingdom to also recognise that Turkey exercised its right of intervention in accordance with Article IV of the Treaty of Guarantee. Further more the United Kingdom should also acknowledge and recognise that Turkey was justified to intervene on July 20Th 1974 in order to prevent the ongoing bloodbath and carnage of the minority Turkish population in Cyprus.

rejection.details: Your petition should request a specific action or change, not acknowledgement that a particular personal point of view is correct or otherwise.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
